name: Dark Raichu

passive.name: Chaos Panic
passive.effect: Whenever one of your Pokemon attack, move all your Lightning Energy to a random Pokemon.

attacks.name: Sheer Shock
attacks.effect: Deal 20 damage to a random Pokemon that isn't Lightning type for each Lightning Energy attached to Raichu.

flavor: Some Pikachu get tired of being used for power generation. The electricity they were used to generate has made them literally mad with power.
